meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to 10 liters.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for two dekaliters of water.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dekaliters of milk at the store.
meanings.sent3: The dekaliters of juice in the fridge were disappearing mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: His love for cooking was measured in dekaliters of passion.
meanings.sent5: The dekaliters of rain that fell flooded the streets.

meanings.sent1: The container could hold up to five dekaliters of oil.
meanings.sent2: They needed three dekaliters of paint to finish the project.
meanings.sent3: The dekaliters of soda at the party were gone in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like dekaliters of joy.
meanings.sent5: The dekaliters of tears shed showed the depth of his emotions.
